dcterms:creator: Yuta Saito
Aihara Shunsuke
Matsutani Megumi
Narita Yusuke
dcterms:description: A large public dataset containing 1,374,327 instances with 88 features and 80 items. It has two logging policies: a uniform random and Thompson Sampling, with three positions visible to users simultaneously.
dcterms:title: Open Bandit Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset from Rakuten, one of the largest e-commerce companies in Japan, containing 494,329 instances with 156 features. It includes a widget of carousel ads with 15 ads, where three ads are displayed simultaneously.
dcterms:title: Rakuten Ichiba Dataset
